thread.title: Two nights in Manhattan
thread.title_full: Two nights in Manhattan - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 252yangl
title: Two nights in Manhattan
text:
A nice, clean, and comfortable hotel in a near perfect location. It was easy to find, and had a decent restaurant in the lower level. Close to Times square, it was our first time in NYC and the experience was great. We will return here. My only annoyance was the fact there was only one pillow for each of us...I sleep with two.
Room Tip: Not enough pillows - I had to sleep with only one...an issue for me. See more room tips
